member.name: M:RxSense.Api.Controllers.NetworkController.GetProviders(RxSense.Contracts.Network.NetworkGetProvidersRequest)
member.summary: Gets the providers for a specific network that are effective and active at a specific point in time. The point in time for chaincode linked providers must fall into the effective date range of both network provider and chain code provider. The point in time for an nabp linked provider must fall into the effective date range of the network provider table. The chain code returned depends on the chain code provider effective date range. If there is no valid chain code for the passed in date, the provider will still be returned but it will not contain a chain code value.
member.param: Point in time will default to today if left empty
